text: Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, a ghaze: Ia uan amuiba ko, uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn bizibar amutɨ da otivasa. Ia kamaghɨn akam akɨrigha mɨkeme, ‘E ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuim tuegh, Overiamɨn Kwin bagh wainɨn ofaba ingasa akam akɨri. Ezɨ bar guizbangɨra, e akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam damutɨ an otivam.’ Aria, ia bizir ia damuasa akam akɨriziba, ia mangɨ dar amutɨ da otiv.
